channel.title: Updated Baron (Neutral Offensive)
channel.description:
With the big changes to Royal Blood and previous changes to Noble, I made this updated version of @ThePlex's Baron.
---
><big>**[color=#008080]The Baron[/color]**</big> > [color=lightgrey]**Neutral Social**[/color] > >**Royal Blood (Passive)** - Votes to elect you King will count as double. > >**Political Pressure (Day)** - Force a player to accuse another player and prevent them from voting further. *(2 uses)* **Pull Rank (Day)** - Your vote for execution and pardon will count twice. *(2 uses)* > >**Gossip (Night)** - See the feedback of all abilities used on target player. *(3 uses)* **Espionage (Night)** - See the contents of all whispers tomorrow. *(2 uses)* > >_Your objective is to become the King, or survive to see the Blue Dragon’s demise._
>**Becomes the [color=purple]Evil King[/color].**
---- Let me know what really needs changing.

item.title: Updated Baron (Neutral Offensive)
item.dc:creator: Livicus
item.description:
I think its purpose is to make it so that not every Royal Blood is BD, but with the recent changes, don’t know if it’s as needed anymore

item.title: Updated Baron (Neutral Offensive)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Alternatively you could make him a bit like the witch. Here is a class card for that:

Baron

Neutral Offensive
Passive 1: Royal Blood
Passive 2: Hired guards - immune to death once

Day Ability 1: Political Pressure - Force one player to vote another
Day Ability 2: Eavesdrop - Hear whispers to and from target player until you chose another target. You may switch targets as much as you want throughout the day. You may use this Ability at the same time as political pressure. (Unlimited)

Night Ability: Bribe - Redirect your first target to your second. You will get their night results. (Unlimited)
Goal: Survive to see the BD fall

Read full topic

item.title: Updated Baron (Neutral Offensive)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
I’ve always thought that the Baron should be less of a Noble copy and more of an anti-BD investigative

Baron

Neutral Investigative
Passive 1: Royal Blood
Passive 2: Hired guards - immune to death once

Day Ability 1: Political Pressure - Force one player to vote another
Day Ability 2: Eavesdrop - Hear whispers to and from target player until you chose another target. You may switch targets as much as you want throughout the day. You may use this Ability at the same time as political pressure. (Unlimited)

Night Ability 1: Intersept - Target player gets incorrect results from their ability’s. You will get the unaltered results. (Unlimited)
Night Ability 2: Royal Decree - if target player is royal remove the passive. Otherwise give it to them. You will know which one you do. (3 uses)

Goal: Become King or survive to see the blue dragon lose

The Tyrant King

Neutral Special
Passive: Scheming Tenacity - Immune to being occupied and redirected. You can see all whispers

Day Ability 1: Royal Finger - Your next vote for treason will count twice. (Unlimited)
Day Ability 2: Decide Fate - You may choose the whether the player on trial will be executed or pardoned. (1 use)

Night Ability 1: Guards - Give target player night immunity. (3 uses)
Night Ability 2: Investigations - Determine player’s class. (2 uses)

Goal: See Blue Dragon’s demise.

I’ve make a rant already about why targeted whisper reading is better than blanket whisper reading on scum. This makes him more versatile than a Noble clone while still being able to fake Noble if he wants. Once he’s king it is ok for him to see all whispers. He had to work to get that far afterall.

Read full topic

Because why not.

Fite me

item.title: Updated Baron (Neutral Offensive)
item.dc:creator: Twil1ight
item.description:
How about this variation?

The Baron
Neutral Offensive

Royal Blood (Passive) - Votes to elect you King will count as double.
Secret Negotiantons (Passive) - You’re immune to any attacks beside from Blue Dragon’s.

Political Treachery (Day) - Force a player to accuse another player and prevent them from voting further also your vote will count twice. (2 uses)
Handsome Bribe (Day) - Block all Kings nights abilities tonight. King won’t know it fails. (2 uses)

Forced Disinheritance (Night) - Choose player. If they have a Royal Blood, you will disable this passive, they won’t know. If they don’t have you will occupy them instead. (3 uses)
Espionage (Night) - See the contents of all whispers tomorrow. (3 uses)

Become a Tyrant King.

Becomes the Tyrant King.

The Tyrant King
Neutral Special

Tenacity (Passive) - Immune to death once. Immune to being occupied and redirected.

Royal Finger (Day) - Your next vote for treason will count twice. (Infinite uses)
Decide Fate (Day) You may choose the whether the player on trial will be executed or pardoned. - (1 use)

Dark Whispers (Night) - Choose player. If player is a Blue Dragon he will appear as suspicious to investigators. If not then they will appear as Blue Dragon tonight. (2 uses)
Powerful Allies (Night) - Determine player’s faction. If they’re Blue Dragon you will occupy them. (2 uses)

Survive to see Blue Dragon’s demise.

As this class you can still claim and same time sabotage King’s Actions / Important BD to help evils out.

Having colliding wincons is confusing and making NK live little harder for no reason.

In that way, BD May not believe instantly Noble claim to suspect it might be a Baron. Disabling RB would also be important in some cases.

But as leverage for BD I would make him Unique, to not have better chance to screw up BD by RNG,

Any feetback is welcome.

Read full topic

item.title: Updated Baron (Neutral Offensive)
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
Welcome to the club buddy

Unfortunately all of the unique stuff was stolen via patches

Which, don’t get me wrong, are great and amazing and way more important than an old class suggestion

But

I kinda want a NE who has to be the King

So I’m opening fixing this up to all y’all

Read full topic
